panels.description: Shows how many times was particular alert started in a defined time range. Alert can be started either directly as "firing" or as a "pending". Pending alerts wait for a defined time before it flips to a "firing" alert. This is specified with the "FOR" clause in a Prometheus "rules" file.
panels.title: Total Alert Counts

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(sipfe_sip_node_request_duration_seconds_bucket{pod=~"$pod", tenant=~"$tenant", sip_node_id=~"$sip_node_id", status="200"}[5m])) by (le, pod, sip_node_id))

panels.title: SIP Cluster Service response time (95 quantile)
Kafka prod queue depth (nbr of messages)
Nbr of ERROR responses [1min]: SIPFE <- SIP Cluster
Nbr of ERROR responses [1min]: SIPFE -> Tenant
Increase of Kafka producer errors over 5 min interval

title: Voice / SIP Front End / Service metrics
